overview: The Path to RailBlazer tells the story of bringing the first single-rail roller coaster to the West Coast from the team who were directly responsible for its construction. Produced by the American Coaster Enthusiasts in conjunction with Inside CGA and Totally Twisted Media.
tagline: From concept to reality, the inside story behind the single rail coaster - The Path to RailBlazer.
title: The Path to RailBlazer
